name: BlackWarGreymon
effect: [When Digivolving] If this Digimon has a red digivolution card, choose any number of your opponent's Digimon. If this Digimon has a black digivolution card, choose any number of your opponent's Tamers. The chosen cards' play costs must add up to 6 or less. Delete the chosen cards.[All Turns][Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted, you may unsuspend this Digimon.
